description:
Model: Linear Regression Baseline
Description: This model uses a linear regression approach to predict the shift in PiO2 based on the raw shift, PiO2, and SpO2 values. It is trained on a dataset of neonatal patients with ODC data.
Features: shift_raw, PiO2(kPa), SpO2(%)
Target: shift
Notes: patient-level macro metrics, ODC from neonatal table

Model: Lasso Regression Baseline
Description: This model uses a lasso regression approach to predict the shift in PiO2 based on the raw shift, PiO2, and SpO2 values. The goal is to perform feature selection using the L1 regularization of the Lasso technique to find the subset of features that best predicts the shift. The model is trained on the full training set and evaluated on the full test set.
Features: shift_raw, PiO2(kPa), SpO2(%)
Target: shift
Notes: patient-level macro metrics, ODC from neonatal table
